briefdescription.para: Minimum thrust in auto thrust control.

simplesect.title: It's recommended to set it > 0 to avoid free fall with zero thrust.

briefdescription.para: Hover thrust.

simplesect.title: Vertical thrust required to hover. This value is mapped to center
simplesect.para: stick for manual throttle control. With this value set to the thrust required to hover, transition from manual to ALTCTL mode while hovering will occur with the throttle stick near center, which is then interpreted as (near) zero demand for vertical speed.

briefdescription.para: Maximum thrust in auto thrust control.

simplesect.title: Limit max allowed thrust. Setting a value of one can put
simplesect.para: the system into actuator saturation as no spread between the motors is possible any more. A value of 0.8 - 0.9 is recommended.

briefdescription.para: Minimum manual thrust.

simplesect.title: Minimum vertical thrust. It's recommended to set it > 0 to avoid

briefdescription.para: Maximum manual thrust.

simplesect.title: Limit max allowed thrust. Setting a value of one can put
simplesect.para: the system into actuator saturation as no spread between the motors is possible any more. A value of 0.8 - 0.9 is recommended.

briefdescription.para: Proportional gain for vertical position error.
Proportional gain for vertical velocity error.
Integral gain for vertical velocity error.

simplesect.title: Non zero value allows hovering thrust estimation on stabilized or

briefdescription.para: Differential gain for vertical velocity error.
Maximum vertical ascent velocity.

simplesect.title: Maximum vertical velocity in AUTO mode and endpoint for

briefdescription.para: Maximum vertical descent velocity.

simplesect.title: Maximum vertical velocity in AUTO mode and endpoint for

briefdescription.para: Vertical velocity feed forward.

simplesect.title: Feed forward weight for altitude control in stabilized modes
simplesect.para: (ALTCTRL, POSCTRL). 0 will give slow response and no overshot, 1 - fast response and big overshot.

briefdescription.para: Proportional gain for horizontal position error.
Proportional gain for horizontal velocity error.
Non-zero value allows to resist wind.
Differential gain for horizontal velocity error. Small values help reduce fast oscillations. If value is too big oscillations will appear again.
Nominal horizontal velocity in mission.
Distance Threshold Horizontal Auto.

simplesect.title: The distance defines at which point the vehicle
simplesect.para: has to slow down to reach target if no direct passing to the next target is desired.

briefdescription.para: Maximum horizontal velocity.

simplesect.title: Maximum horizontal velocity in AUTO mode. If higher speeds
simplesect.para: are commanded in a mission they will be capped to this velocity.

briefdescription.para: Horizontal velocity feed forward.

simplesect.title: Feed forward weight for position control in position control mode (POSCTRL).
simplesect.para: 0 will give slow response and no overshot, 1 - fast response and big overshot.

briefdescription.para: Maximum tilt angle in air.

simplesect.title: Limits maximum tilt in AUTO and POSCTRL modes during flight.

briefdescription.para: Maximum tilt angle during landing.

simplesect.title: Limits maximum tilt angle on landing.

briefdescription.para: Landing descend rate.
Takeoff climb rate.
Maximal tilt angle in manual or altitude mode.
Max manual yaw rate.
Deadzone of sticks where position hold is enabled.
Maximum horizontal velocity for which position hold is enabled (use 0 to disable check).
Maximum vertical velocity for which position hold is enabled (use 0 to disable check)
Low pass filter cut freq. for numerical velocity derivative.
Maximum horizonal acceleration in velocity controlled modes.
Maximum vertical acceleration in velocity controlled modes upward.
Maximum vertical acceleration in velocity controlled modes down.
Altitude control mode, note mode 1 only tested with LPE.
Manual control stick exponential curve sensitivity attenuation with small velocity setpoints.

simplesect.title: 0: Purely linear input curve, 1: Purely cubic input curve

briefdescription.para: Manual control stick vertical exponential curve.

simplesect.title: The higher the value the less sensitivity the stick has
simplesect.para: around zero while still reaching the maximum value with full stick deflection.

simplesect.title: 0: Purely linear input curve, 1: Purely cubic input curve

briefdescription.para: Altitude for step 1 of slow landing (descend)

simplesect.title: Below this altitude descending velocity gets limited
simplesect.para: to a value between #Z_VEL_MAX and LAND_SPEED to enable a smooth descent experience. Value needs to be higher than LAND_ALT2

briefdescription.para: Altitude for step 2 of slow landing (landing)

simplesect.title: Below this altitude descending velocity gets limited to
simplesect.para: LAND_SPEED. Value needs to be lower than LAND_ALT1.

briefdescription.para: Position control smooth takeoff ramp time constant.

simplesect.title: Increasing this value will make automatic and manual takeoff
simplesect.para: slower. If it's too slow the drone might scratch the ground and tip over.

briefdescription.para: Max yaw rate.
Yaw P gain.

simplesect.title: Yaw proportional gain, i.e. desired angular speed in rad/s for error 1 rad.

briefdescription.para: Cruising speed at 90.

simplesect.title: Cruise speed when angle prev-current/current-next setpoint
simplesect.para: is 90 degrees. It should be lower than XY_CRUISE.

simplesect.title: Applies only in AUTO modes (includes also RTL / hold / etc.)

briefdescription.para: Maximum jerk in manual controlled mode for BRAKING to zero.

simplesect.title: If this value is below MPC_JERK_MIN, the acceleration limit in xy
simplesect.para: and z is MPC_ACC_HOR_MAX and MPC_ACC_UP_MAX respectively instantaneously when the user demands brake (=zero stick input). Otherwise the acceleration limit increases from current acceleration limit towards MPC_ACC_HOR_MAX/MPC_ACC_UP_MAX with jerk limit

briefdescription.para: Minimum jerk in manual controlled mode for BRAKING to zero.
Slow horizontal manual deceleration for manual mode.
Maximum horizontal velocity setpoint for manual controlled mode.

simplesect.title: If velocity setpoint larger than MPC_XY_VEL_MAX is set, then
simplesect.para: the setpoint will be capped to MPC_XY_VEL_MAX

briefdescription.para: Acceptance Radius.

simplesect.title: Default acceptance radius, overridden by acceptance radius of
simplesect.para: waypoint if set. For fixed wing the L1 turning distance is used for horizontal acceptance.

briefdescription.para: Max yaw error in degrees needed for waypoint heading acceptance.
Definition for a single config table entry.
